Floral Basket and Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russian State Academy Ensemble
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gifts to Kim Jong Il from Russian State Academy Ensemble 
    Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and gift by the visiting State Academy Ensemble of the Ministry of Interior of Russia.
 The floral basket and gift were conveyed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Viktor Eliseyev, head of the ensemble, yesterday.    
 A gift to Kim Jong Il from Viktor Eliseyev was also conveyed.

articles.title: Symposium on Orientation of Peace and Reunification Movement
articles.content:
Symposium on Orientation of Peace and Reunification Movement
    Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- A symposium on the orientation of the peace and reunification movement corresponding to the "general election" was reportedly held by the South Headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification, the "National Alliance for Democracy and Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the Citizens' Solidarity for Peaceful Reunification and other reunification movement organizations of south Korea on February 17.
 At the symposium speakers said that it is the first task to vote down the anti-reunification forces including the Grand National Party in the forthcoming general election. They called upon the civic and public organizations aspiring after peace and reunification to jointly conduct a campaign for defeating anti-peace, anti-reunification and anti-national candidates for the general election.    
 The symposium set it as the orientation of the peace and reunification movement to liquidate the anti-peace, anti-reunification and anti-national forces.

Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolence to Acting President of Macedonia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Condolence to Acting President of Macedonia
    Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a message of condolence to Ljubco Jordanovski, acting President of Macedonia, over the sudden death of its President Boris Trajkovski in an accident.
 The message expressed deep condolence to him and, through him, to the government of Macedonia and its people and the bereaved families of the deceased.
